name: 9th Annual SERGS meeting, Lille, France
content: The 9th European annual meeting of SERGS will be held in LILLE, France on June 14-16, 2017\. The CRG (the French surgical group in gynaecological robot-assisted laparoscopy) is pleased to organise this famous meeting for the second time, the first time being in Marseille in 2012\. Our annual French meeting will also be associated with SERGS in 2017\. We are initiating the mini-invasive management of gynaecology patients by increasing mini-invasive surgery, including conventional, single port, and robot-assisted surgery, and encouraging the development of specific instruments and fast-track surgery.
